ygData.subject: RE: Rules and FAQ 1.6 - PLEASE READ THIS!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You can buy it from several vendors, including the one who sells milk just outside the Freeport bank.  It has the wonderful bonus effect of looking like a
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 17 Dec 1999, JasonF wrote:
>
> > Q: Are there any magical or "Unique" instruments for Bards?
> > A: Yes, there are several known "special" instruments in the world.
>
> Once on a corpse retrieval a fellow bard gave me a piece of "Raw Bamboo" to
> use for invisibility and said "Try this." Well the graphic looked like the
> Wooden Flute graphic so I equipped it and it did in fact work as a wind
> instrument. I don't have a clue where the bard got the Raw Bamboo, and it
> had no bonuses or effects.

You can buy it from several vendors, including the one who
sells milk just outside the Freeport bank. It has the
wonderful bonus effect of looking like a flute, but not
inflicting that horrible dance upon you.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
